title: Create a Simple Record
description:
Create a record named 'Book' with:
- String title
- String author
- int pages

In main, create a Book with title "1984", author "Orwell", pages 328.
Print the book's title using the accessor method.

Expected output: 1984
instructions:

hints.text: Records are declared with the syntax: record Name(Type field1, Type field2) {}
Record accessor methods don't use 'get' prefix - just use book.title() not book.getTitle()

commonMistakes.correction: Records use component name as accessor: title() not getTitle()
Records are immutable - create a new record instead
